description:
Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle!  However, that won’t stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura – he departs for the notorious thief’s cursed village where the spirits of old are ready to tear the Pharaoh down!  Yugi and pals have their own mission to help save the world, but little do they realize that their seemingly-innocent journey will soon have them risking their lives...
Source: crunchyroll
